name: Total Agent Memory Projects
description: Total number of analyzed agent memory projects in the ecosystem

name: Production-Ready Platforms Growing
description: Mature platforms (mem0, letta, graphiti) showing strong adoption with 10K+ stars

name: Explosive New Entrants (2026)
description: Recent projects (claude-mem 27K stars in 2 days, SimpleMem, memtrace, easymemory) showing explosive growth

name: Benchmark Standardization
description: LoCoMo (ACL 2024) and LongMemEval (ICLR 2025) becoming standard evaluation benchmarks

name: Academic Research Activity
description: Growing academic interest with NeurIPS 2025, ICLR 2026, ACL 2024 acceptances

name: Vector Search Dominance
description: 72% of projects use vector databases, indicating semantic search as primary approach

name: Knowledge Graph Hybrid Approach
description: 32% combining knowledge graphs with vectors for enhanced reasoning capabilities

name: Privacy-Focused Local Deployment
description: Emerging trend toward 100% local deployment (easymemory, claude-mem) for data privacy

name: Compression & Efficiency
description: Focus on token reduction (90% with mem0) and semantic compression (SimpleMem)

name: Framework Integration Ecosystem
description: Deep integration with LangChain, CrewAI, MCP protocol becoming standard

name: Multi-Agent Memory Sharing
description: Growing support for collaborative memory across multiple agents

name: Temporal Modeling Innovation
description: Bi-temporal approaches (graphiti) and time-series focus (memtrace) emerging
